<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>extract missing attributes from payload</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var trd = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_mss_custod_mss_custody_event_inbound_staging');
if (trd.get('ba60fa2f1b71ce94ff37eb14b24bcb2d')) {
    var responseData = trd.trade_details;
    responseData = new JSON.parse(responseData);
    var count = Object.keys(responseData);
    gs.info('Size of Object :' + count);
}



//working code

 ////Added as part of MSSOTIQUBE-315
    //logAttributes: function(trdData) {
        var missingAttr = [];
        var responseData = new global.JSON.parse(trdData);
        var count = Object.keys(responseData); //extract keys from the payload
        for (var i = 0; i < count.length; i++) {
            if (responseData[count[i]] == '') {
                missingAttr.push(count[i]); // Attributes with empty values
            }
        }
            //return missingAttr;

    //},
    ////Added as part of MSSOTIQUBE-315

//working code
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
